languages.text: This creature shoots at a target suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} and deals <u>(from 12 to 24)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}. The target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} instead of bleeding, and all the creatures around it suffer bleeding (8).
languages.original_text: Существо стреляет в цель, страдающую от {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g}, нанося <u>(от 12 до 24)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}психического урона{/g}. С цели снимается кровотечение, и вместо этого она получает {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломление{/g}, а все существа вокруг нее получают кровотечение (8).

traits.locale_text: This creature shoots at a target suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} and deals 12-24 {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}. The target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} instead of bleeding, and all the creatures around it suffer bleeding (8).

This creature shoots at a target suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} and deals <u>(from 12 to 24)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}. The target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} instead of bleeding, and all the creatures around it suffer bleeding (8).

This creature shoots at a target suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} and deals <u>(from 12 to 24)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}. The target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} instead of bleeding, and all the creatures around it suffer bleeding (8).

languages.text: Существо стреляет в цель, страдающую от {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g}, нанося <u>(от 12 до 24)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}психического урона{/g}. С цели снимается кровотечение, и вместо этого она получает {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломление{/g}, а все существа вокруг нее получают кровотечение (8).
languages.original_text: This creature shoots at a target suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} and deals <u>(from 12 to 24)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}. The target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} instead of bleeding, and all the creatures around it suffer bleeding (8).

languages.text: 此生物向{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}的目标射击，造成<u>12-24</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神伤害{/g}。受到攻击的目标失去流血效果，陷入{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}状态，周围所有生物获得流血（8）效果。
languages.original_text: This creature shoots at a target suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} and deals <u>(from 12 to 24)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}. The target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} instead of bleeding, and all the creatures around it suffer bleeding (8).

traits.locale_text: 此生物向{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}的目标射击，造成<u>12-24</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神伤害{/g}。受到攻击的目标失去流血效果，陷入{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}状态，周围所有生物获得流血（8）效果。

languages.text: この生物は{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}中のターゲットに発射し、<u>12～24</u>{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神的ダメージ{/g}を与える。ターゲットは出血が止まり、{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}よろけ{/g}状態になるが、周囲の生物たちに出血(8)を付与する。
languages.original_text: This creature shoots at a target suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} and deals <u>(from 12 to 24)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}. The target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} instead of bleeding, and all the creatures around it suffer bleeding (8).

traits.locale_text: この生物は{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}に苦しんでいるターゲットに射撃を行い、12～24の{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神的ダメージ{/g}を与える。ターゲットは出血する代わりに{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}よろけ状態{/g}となり、周囲の生物は全て出血(8)する。

languages.text: Esta criatura dispara a un objetivo que sufre {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} e inflige <u>(de 12 a 24)</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}daño mental{/g}. En vez de sufrir hemorragia, el objetivo queda {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}desequilibrado{/g} y las criaturas que la rodean sufren hemorragia (8).
languages.original_text: This creature shoots at a target suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} and deals <u>(from 12 to 24)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}. The target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} instead of bleeding, and all the creatures around it suffer bleeding (8).

traits.locale_text: Esta criatura dispara a un objetivo que sufre {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} e inflige 12-24 de {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}daño mental{/g}. En vez de sufrir hemorragia, el objetivo queda {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}desequilibrado{/g} y las criaturas que la rodean sufren hemorragia (8).

languages.text: Diese Kreatur schießt auf ein mit {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} belegtes Ziel und verursacht <u>(12 bis 24)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}Mentalschaden{/g}. Das Ziel wird mit {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Taumelnd{/g} belegt und alle Kreaturen um das Ziel herum erleiden Blutung (8).
languages.original_text: This creature shoots at a target suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} and deals <u>(from 12 to 24)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}. The target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} instead of bleeding, and all the creatures around it suffer bleeding (8).

traits.locale_text: Diese Kreatur schießt auf ein unter {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} leidendes Ziel und verursacht 12-24 {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}Mentalschaden{/g}. Das Ziel erleidet {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Taumelnd{/g} anstatt Blutung und alle Kreaturen um das Zeil herum erleiden Blutung (8).

languages.text: Cette créature tire sur une cible frappée par l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} et lui inflige <u>(de 12 à 24)</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}dégâts mentaux{/g}. La cible subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g} à la place de l'effet Saignement, et toutes les créatures qui l'entourent subissent l'effet Saignement (8).
languages.original_text: This creature shoots at a target suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} and deals <u>(from 12 to 24)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}. The target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} instead of bleeding, and all the creatures around it suffer bleeding (8).

traits.locale_text: Cette créature tire sur une cible frappée par l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} et lui inflige 12 à 24 points de {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}dégâts mentaux{/g}. La cible subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g} à la place de l'effet Saignement, et toutes les créatures qui l'entourent subissent l'effet Saignement (8).

languages.text: Bu yaratık, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}kan kaybeden{/g} bir hedefe nişan alır ve <u>(12 ila 24)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}zihinsel hasar{/g} verir. Hedef, artık kan kaybetmek yerine {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}afallar{/g} ve çevresindeki tüm yaratıklar da kanamaya (8) maruz kalır.
languages.original_text: This creature shoots at a target suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} and deals <u>(from 12 to 24)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}. The target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} instead of bleeding, and all the creatures around it suffer bleeding (8).
